activity.text:
Hi @nihal467 @rithviknishad 
i would like to take up this issue.
My approach

- Check authentication before rendering protected routes.
- Store the original URL .
- Redirect to the login page if unauthenticated.
- On successful login, redirect back using navigate().

ETA:11 june

My approch:

-  On change, re-compute and update the child question’s options dynamically based on the latest 
-  parent selection.
